title: Start
text: You're standing outside. You see a house in the distance. Behind you sit a forest. What do you do ?

title: House
text: You enter the house. The house is empty.

title: Forest
text: You walk through the forest. You suddenly hear some noise a few feet away. What do you do ?
You find yourself in front of a wolf. The beast jumps on you and kill you. Game over.
